p: Click on the World button at the top to hide Reeborg's world; click also on the Diary button to reveal Reeborg's diary, the place where our favourite robot writes. You should see a button labeled Deselect world; click it and a button labeled Execute should be enabled. If, for some reason, the Deselect world button was disabled initially (so you couldn't click on it), reopen Reeborg's world (by clicking on the World button at the very top), select a world and close Reeborg's world.
Have Reeborg execute the following program
You should see that Reeborg wrote the answer to the ultimate question about life, the universe and everything [at least according to The Hitchhiker's guide to the Galaxy] in his diary.
Try running the following program and look at the output in Reeborg's diary.
pre: write( 2 + 3 ); // adding numbers write( 2 * 3 ); // multiplying numbers write( 3 - 2 ); // subtracting numbers write( 6 / 2 ); // dividing numbers write( 1 + 3 * 2 ); // multiplication is done before addition write( (1 + 3) * 2 ); // using parentheses to change normal order of operations
